name: .GRINDX File Extension
summary: Learn about .GRINDX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Recipe file created by Juice Grinder, a program used to create and save eJuice recipes for personal vaporizers; contains a recipe calculated from information in the Juice Grinder .DEFT file; includes flavor, nicotine, PG, and VG ingredients; can be exported as a .PDF, .CSV, and .XLSX file.

content: NOTE: The GRINDX file was introduced in version 1.1 of Juice Grinder and replaced the .GRIND file extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
